title: Echo….?
detail_text: <:th_ch0000/>Nico Nico Nii~. Anata no Haato ni Nico Nico Nii~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Huh…. Who’s imitating Nico’s line…. It can’t be…. A faker!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Egao Todokeru Yazawa Nico Nico~. Nico Nii tte Oboete Rabu Nico~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Kuh…. Who!? Who is it!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Eh…. Nico-san? Why are you here?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Shizuku! Perfect timing! Just now there was someone that was impersonating this Nico Nii! Did you see anyone like that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>…. No? I didn’t see anyone?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Kuh…. That voice’s volume…. I was pretty sure it got louder around here<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>U- umm~, Nico-san, what are you planning to do if you find the person impersonating you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>That’s obvious! We’ll have a match! I’ll show them that Nico is on a way different level!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>….G-, good luck with that. Then, excuse me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
